law.catch_line: Applicability of powers in KRS 395.195 and 395.196.
law.text: The powers set forth in KRS 395.195 and 395.196 shall not be effective as to wills executed or personal representatives appointed and qualifying prior to June 19, 1976.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 259, sec. 22, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 53.
